CustomField.description: This field will be hidden from end users. It will be used to "lock" the Priority Level from future changes caused by new RLCVs since a Deputy Overrode the priority previously. Deputies can still make manual overrides if this is true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be hidden from end users. It will be used to "lock" the Priority Level from future changes caused by new RLCVs since a Deputy Overrode the priority previously. Deputies can still make manual overrides if this is true.
CustomField.label: Lock Priority from Automatic Updates
